00020 "#define mymake_float4 (float4)\n"
00021 "__inline float dot3F4(float4 a, float4 b)\n"
00022 "{\n"
00023 "       float4 a1 = mymake_float4(a.xyz,0.f);\n"
00024 "       float4 b1 = mymake_float4(b.xyz,0.f);\n"
00025 "       return dot(a1, b1);\n"
00026 "}\n"
00027 "typedef float4 Quaternion;\n"
00028 "typedef struct\n"
00029 "{\n"
00030 "       float4 m_row[3];\n"
00031 "}Matrix3x3;\n"
00032 "__inline\n"
00033 "float4 mtMul1(Matrix3x3 a, float4 b);\n"
00034 "__inline\n"
00035 "float4 mtMul3(float4 a, Matrix3x3 b);\n"
00036 "__inline\n"
00037 "float4 mtMul1(Matrix3x3 a, float4 b)\n"
00038 "{\n"
00039 "       float4 ans;\n"
00040 "       ans.x = dot3F4( a.m_row[0], b );\n"
00041 "       ans.y = dot3F4( a.m_row[1], b );\n"
00042 "       ans.z = dot3F4( a.m_row[2], b );\n"
00043 "       ans.w = 0.f;\n"
00044 "       return ans;\n"
00045 "}\n"
00046 "__inline\n"
00047 "float4 mtMul3(float4 a, Matrix3x3 b)\n"
00048 "{\n"
00049 "       float4 colx = mymake_float4(b.m_row[0].x, b.m_row[1].x, b.m_row[2].x, 0);\n"
00050 "       float4 coly = mymake_float4(b.m_row[0].y, b.m_row[1].y, b.m_row[2].y, 0);\n"
00051 "       float4 colz = mymake_float4(b.m_row[0].z, b.m_row[1].z, b.m_row[2].z, 0);\n"
00052 "       float4 ans;\n"
00053 "       ans.x = dot3F4( a, colx );\n"
00054 "       ans.y = dot3F4( a, coly );\n"
00055 "       ans.z = dot3F4( a, colz );\n"
00056 "       return ans;\n"
00057 "}\n"

00116 "    float              m_lowerLimit;\n"

00118 "       float           m_rhsPenetration;\n"
00119 "       int                     m_originalConstraint;\n"
00120 "       int     m_overrideNumSolverIterations;\n"
00121 "    int                        m_frictionIndex;\n"

00151 "__inline\n"
00152 "float4 cross3(float4 a, float4 b)\n"
00153 "{\n"
00154 "       return cross(a,b);\n"
00155 "}\n"
00156 "__inline\n"
00157 "float4 fastNormalize4(float4 v)\n"
00158 "{\n"
00159 "       v = mymake_float4(v.xyz,0.f);\n"
00160 "       return fast_normalize(v);\n"
00161 "}\n"
00162 "__inline\n"
00163 "Quaternion qtMul(Quaternion a, Quaternion b);\n"
00164 "__inline\n"
00165 "Quaternion qtNormalize(Quaternion in);\n"
00166 "__inline\n"
00167 "float4 qtRotate(Quaternion q, float4 vec);\n"
00168 "__inline\n"
00169 "Quaternion qtInvert(Quaternion q);\n"
00170 "__inline\n"
00171 "Quaternion qtMul(Quaternion a, Quaternion b)\n"
00172 "{\n"
00173 "       Quaternion ans;\n"
00174 "       ans = cross3( a, b );\n"
00175 "       ans += a.w*b+b.w*a;\n"
00176 "//     ans.w = a.w*b.w - (a.x*b.x+a.y*b.y+a.z*b.z);\n"
00177 "       ans.w = a.w*b.w - dot3F4(a, b);\n"
00178 "       return ans;\n"
00179 "}\n"
00180 "__inline\n"
00181 "Quaternion qtNormalize(Quaternion in)\n"
00182 "{\n"
00183 "       return fastNormalize4(in);\n"
00184 "//     in /= length( in );\n"
00185 "//     return in;\n"
00186 "}\n"
00187 "__inline\n"
00188 "float4 qtRotate(Quaternion q, float4 vec)\n"
00189 "{\n"
00190 "       Quaternion qInv = qtInvert( q );\n"
00191 "       float4 vcpy = vec;\n"
00192 "       vcpy.w = 0.f;\n"
00193 "       float4 out = qtMul(qtMul(q,vcpy),qInv);\n"
00194 "       return out;\n"
00195 "}\n"
00196 "__inline\n"
00197 "Quaternion qtInvert(Quaternion q)\n"
00198 "{\n"
00199 "       return (Quaternion)(-q.xyz, q.w);\n"
00200 "}\n"
00201 "__inline void internalApplyImpulse(__global b3GpuSolverBody* body,  float4 linearComponent, float4 angularComponent,float impulseMagnitude)\n"
00202 "{\n"
00203 "       body->m_deltaLinearVelocity += linearComponent*impulseMagnitude*body->m_linearFactor;\n"
00204 "       body->m_deltaAngularVelocity += angularComponent*(impulseMagnitude*body->m_angularFactor);\n"
00205 "}\n"
00206 "void resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(__global b3GpuSolverBody* body1, __global b3GpuSolverBody* body2, __global b3SolverConstraint* c)\n"
00207 "{\n"
00208 "       float deltaImpulse = c->m_rhs-c->m_appliedImpulse*c->m_cfm;\n"
00209 "       float deltaVel1Dotn     =       dot3F4(c->m_contactNormal,body1->m_deltaLinearVelocity)         + dot3F4(c->m_relpos1CrossNormal,body1->m_deltaAngularVelocity);\n"
00210 "       float deltaVel2Dotn     =       -dot3F4(c->m_contactNormal,body2->m_deltaLinearVelocity) + dot3F4(c->m_relpos2CrossNormal,body2->m_deltaAngularVelocity);\n"
00211 "       deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel1Dotn*c->m_jacDiagABInv;\n"
00212 "       deltaImpulse    -=      deltaVel2Dotn*c->m_jacDiagABInv;\n"
00213 "       float sum = c->m_appliedImpulse + deltaImpulse;\n"
00214 "       if (sum < c->m_lowerLimit)\n"
00215 "       {\n"
00216 "               deltaImpulse = c->m_lowerLimit-c->m_appliedImpulse;\n"
00217 "               c->m_appliedImpulse = c->m_lowerLimit;\n"
00218 "       }\n"
00219 "       else if (sum > c->m_upperLimit) \n"
00220 "       {\n"
00221 "               deltaImpulse = c->m_upperLimit-c->m_appliedImpulse;\n"
00222 "               c->m_appliedImpulse = c->m_upperLimit;\n"
00223 "       }\n"
00224 "       else\n"
00225 "       {\n"
00226 "               c->m_appliedImpulse = sum;\n"
00227 "       }\n"
00228 "       internalApplyImpulse(body1,c->m_contactNormal*body1->m_invMass,c->m_angularComponentA,deltaImpulse);\n"
00229 "       internalApplyImpulse(body2,-c->m_contactNormal*body2->m_invMass,c->m_angularComponentB,deltaImpulse);\n"
00230 "}\n"
00231 "__kernel void solveJointConstraintRows(__global b3GpuSolverBody* solverBodies,\n"
00232 "                                         __global b3BatchConstraint* batchConstraints,\n"
00233 "                                               __global b3SolverConstraint* rows,\n"
00234 "                                               __global unsigned int* numConstraintRowsInfo1, \n"
00235 "                                               __global unsigned int* rowOffsets,\n"
00236 "                                               __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraints,\n"
00237 "                                               int batchOffset,\n"
00238 "                                               int numConstraintsInBatch\n"
00239 "                      )\n"
00240 "{\n"
00241 "       int b = get_global_id(0);\n"
00242 "       if (b>=numConstraintsInBatch)\n"
00243 "               return;\n"
00244 "       __global b3BatchConstraint* c = &batchConstraints[b+batchOffset];\n"
00245 "       int originalConstraintIndex = c->m_originalConstraintIndex;\n"
00246 "       if (constraints[originalConstraintIndex].m_flags&B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED)\n"
00247 "       {\n"
00248 "               int numConstraintRows = numConstraintRowsInfo1[originalConstraintIndex];\n"
00249 "               int rowOffset = rowOffsets[originalConstraintIndex];\n"
00250 "               for (int jj=0;jj<numConstraintRows;jj++)\n"
00251 "               {\n"
00252 "                       __global b3SolverConstraint* constraint = &rows[rowOffset+jj];\n"
00253 "                       resolveSingleConstraintRowGeneric(&solverBodies[constraint->m_solverBodyIdA],&solverBodies[constraint->m_solverBodyIdB],constraint);\n"
00254 "               }\n"
00255 "       }\n"
00256 "};\n"
00257 "__kernel void initSolverBodies(__global b3GpuSolverBody* solverBodies,__global b3RigidBodyCL* bodiesCL, int numBodies)\n"
00258 "{\n"
00259 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
00260 "       if (i>=numBodies)\n"
00261 "               return;\n"
00262 "       __global b3GpuSolverBody* solverBody = &solverBodies[i];\n"
00263 "       __global b3RigidBodyCL* bodyCL = &bodiesCL[i];\n"
00264 "       solverBody->m_deltaLinearVelocity = (float4)(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);\n"
00265 "       solverBody->m_deltaAngularVelocity  = (float4)(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);\n"
00266 "       solverBody->m_pushVelocity = (float4)(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);\n"
00267 "       solverBody->m_pushVelocity = (float4)(0.f,0.f,0.f,0.f);\n"
00268 "       solverBody->m_invMass = (float4)(bodyCL->m_invMass,bodyCL->m_invMass,bodyCL->m_invMass,0.f);\n"
00269 "       solverBody->m_originalBodyIndex = i;\n"
00270 "       solverBody->m_angularFactor = (float4)(1,1,1,0);\n"
00271 "       solverBody->m_linearFactor = (float4) (1,1,1,0);\n"
00272 "       solverBody->m_linearVelocity = bodyCL->m_linVel;\n"
00273 "       solverBody->m_angularVelocity = bodyCL->m_angVel;\n"
00274 "}\n"
00275 "__kernel void breakViolatedConstraintsKernel(__global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraints, __global unsigned int* numConstraintRows, __global unsigned int* rowOffsets, __global b3SolverConstraint* rows, int numConstraints)\n"
00276 "{\n"
00277 "       int cid = get_global_id(0);\n"
00278 "       if (cid>=numConstraints)\n"
00279 "               return;\n"
00280 "       int numRows = numConstraintRows[cid];\n"
00281 "       if (numRows)\n"
00282 "       {\n"
00283 "               for (int i=0;i<numRows;i++)\n"
00284 "               {\n"
00285 "                       int rowIndex = rowOffsets[cid]+i;\n"
00286 "                       float breakingThreshold = constraints[cid].m_breakingImpulseThreshold;\n"
00287 "                       if (fabs(rows[rowIndex].m_appliedImpulse) >= breakingThreshold)\n"
00288 "                       {\n"
00289 "                               constraints[cid].m_flags =0;//&= ~B3_CONSTRAINT_FLAG_ENABLED;\n"
00290 "                       }\n"
00291 "               }\n"
00292 "       }\n"
00293 "}\n"
00294 "__kernel void getInfo1Kernel(__global unsigned int* infos, __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraints, int numConstraints)\n"
00295 "{\n"
00296 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
00297 "       if (i>=numConstraints)\n"
00298 "               return;\n"
00299 "       __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraint = &constraints[i];\n"
00300 "       switch (constraint->m_constraintType)\n"
00301 "       {\n"
00302 "               case B3_GPU_POINT2POINT_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:\n"
00303 "               {\n"
00304 "                       infos[i] = 3;\n"
00305 "                       break;\n"
00306 "               }\n"
00307 "               case B3_GPU_FIXED_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:\n"
00308 "               {\n"
00309 "                       infos[i] = 6;\n"
00310 "                       break;\n"
00311 "               }\n"
00312 "               default:\n"
00313 "               {\n"
00314 "               }\n"
00315 "       }\n"
00316 "}\n"
00317 "__kernel void initBatchConstraintsKernel(__global unsigned int* numConstraintRows, __global unsigned int* rowOffsets, \n"
00318 "                                                                               __global b3BatchConstraint* batchConstraints, \n"
00319 "                                                                               __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraints,\n"
00320 "                                                                               __global b3RigidBodyCL* bodies,\n"
00321 "                                                                               int numConstraints)\n"
00322 "{\n"
00323 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
00324 "       if (i>=numConstraints)\n"
00325 "               return;\n"
00326 "       int rbA = constraints[i].m_rbA;\n"
00327 "       int rbB = constraints[i].m_rbB;\n"
00328 "       batchConstraints[i].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = bodies[rbA].m_invMass != 0.f ? rbA : -rbA;\n"
00329 "       batchConstraints[i].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = bodies[rbB].m_invMass != 0.f ? rbB : -rbB;\n"
00330 "       batchConstraints[i].m_batchId = -1;\n"
00331 "       batchConstraints[i].m_originalConstraintIndex = i;\n"
00332 "}\n"
00333 "typedef struct\n"
00334 "{\n"
00335 "       // integrator parameters: frames per second (1/stepsize), default error\n"
00336 "       // reduction parameter (0..1).\n"
00337 "       float fps,erp;\n"
00338 "       // for the first and second body, pointers to two (linear and angular)\n"
00339 "       // n*3 jacobian sub matrices, stored by rows. these matrices will have\n"
00340 "       // been initialized to 0 on entry. if the second body is zero then the\n"
00341 "       // J2xx pointers may be 0.\n"
00342 "       union \n"
00343 "       {\n"
00344 "               __global float4* m_J1linearAxisFloat4;\n"
00345 "               __global float* m_J1linearAxis;\n"
00346 "       };\n"
00347 "       union\n"
00348 "       {\n"
00349 "               __global float4* m_J1angularAxisFloat4;\n"
00350 "               __global float* m_J1angularAxis;\n"
00351 "       };\n"
00352 "       union\n"
00353 "       {\n"
00354 "       __global float4* m_J2linearAxisFloat4;\n"
00355 "       __global float* m_J2linearAxis;\n"
00356 "       };\n"
00357 "       union\n"
00358 "       {\n"
00359 "               __global float4* m_J2angularAxisFloat4;\n"
00360 "               __global float* m_J2angularAxis;\n"
00361 "       };\n"
00362 "       // elements to jump from one row to the next in J's\n"
00363 "       int rowskip;\n"
00364 "       // right hand sides of the equation J*v = c + cfm * lambda. cfm is the\n"
00365 "       // \"constraint force mixing\" vector. c is set to zero on entry, cfm is\n"
00366 "       // set to a constant value (typically very small or zero) value on entry.\n"
00367 "       __global float* m_constraintError;\n"
00368 "       __global float* cfm;\n"
00369 "       // lo and hi limits for variables (set to -/+ infinity on entry).\n"
00370 "       __global float* m_lowerLimit;\n"
00371 "       __global float* m_upperLimit;\n"
00372 "       // findex vector for variables. see the LCP solver interface for a\n"
00373 "       // description of what this does. this is set to -1 on entry.\n"
00374 "       // note that the returned indexes are relative to the first index of\n"
00375 "       // the constraint.\n"
00376 "       __global int *findex;\n"
00377 "       // number of solver iterations\n"
00378 "       int m_numIterations;\n"
00379 "       //damping of the velocity\n"
00380 "       float   m_damping;\n"
00381 "} b3GpuConstraintInfo2;\n"
00382 "void   getSkewSymmetricMatrix(float4 vecIn, __global float4* v0,__global float4* v1,__global float4* v2)\n"
00383 "{\n"
00384 "       *v0 = (float4)(0.               ,-vecIn.z               ,vecIn.y,0.f);\n"
00385 "       *v1 = (float4)(vecIn.z  ,0.                     ,-vecIn.x,0.f);\n"
00386 "       *v2 = (float4)(-vecIn.y ,vecIn.x        ,0.f,0.f);\n"
00387 "}\n"
00388 "void getInfo2Point2Point(__global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraint,b3GpuConstraintInfo2* info,__global b3RigidBodyCL* bodies)\n"
00389 "{\n"
00390 "       float4 posA = bodies[constraint->m_rbA].m_pos;\n"
00391 "       Quaternion rotA = bodies[constraint->m_rbA].m_quat;\n"
00392 "       float4 posB = bodies[constraint->m_rbB].m_pos;\n"
00393 "       Quaternion rotB = bodies[constraint->m_rbB].m_quat;\n"
00394 "               // anchor points in global coordinates with respect to body PORs.\n"
00395 "   \n"
00396 "    // set jacobian\n"
00397 "    info->m_J1linearAxis[0] = 1;\n"
00398 "       info->m_J1linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = 1;\n"
00399 "       info->m_J1linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = 1;\n"
00400 "       float4 a1 = qtRotate(rotA,constraint->m_pivotInA);\n"
00401 "       {\n"
00402 "               __global float4* angular0 = (__global float4*)(info->m_J1angularAxis);\n"
00403 "               __global float4* angular1 = (__global float4*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+info->rowskip);\n"
00404 "               __global float4* angular2 = (__global float4*)(info->m_J1angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);\n"
00405 "               float4 a1neg = -a1;\n"
00406 "               getSkewSymmetricMatrix(a1neg,angular0,angular1,angular2);\n"
00407 "       }\n"
00408 "       if (info->m_J2linearAxis)\n"
00409 "       {\n"
00410 "               info->m_J2linearAxis[0] = -1;\n"
00411 "               info->m_J2linearAxis[info->rowskip+1] = -1;\n"
00412 "               info->m_J2linearAxis[2*info->rowskip+2] = -1;\n"
00413 "       }\n"
00414 "       \n"
00415 "       float4 a2 = qtRotate(rotB,constraint->m_pivotInB);\n"
00416 "   \n"
00417 "       {\n"
00418 "       //      float4 a2n = -a2;\n"
00419 "               __global float4* angular0 = (__global float4*)(info->m_J2angularAxis);\n"
00420 "               __global float4* angular1 = (__global float4*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+info->rowskip);\n"
00421 "               __global float4* angular2 = (__global float4*)(info->m_J2angularAxis+2*info->rowskip);\n"
00422 "               getSkewSymmetricMatrix(a2,angular0,angular1,angular2);\n"
00423 "       }\n"
00424 "    \n"
00425 "    // set right hand side\n"
00426 "//     float currERP = (m_flags & B3_P2P_FLAGS_ERP) ? m_erp : info->erp;\n"
00427 "       float currERP = info->erp;\n"
00428 "       float k = info->fps * currERP;\n"
00429 "    int j;\n"
00430 "       float4 result = a2 + posB - a1 - posA;\n"
00431 "       float* resultPtr = &result;\n"
00432 "       for (j=0; j<3; j++)\n"
00433 "    {\n"
00434 "        info->m_constraintError[j*info->rowskip] = k * (resultPtr[j]);\n"
00435 "    }\n"
00436 "}\n"
00437 "Quaternion nearest( Quaternion first, Quaternion qd)\n"
00438 "{\n"
00439 "       Quaternion diff,sum;\n"
00440 "       diff = first- qd;\n"
00441 "       sum = first + qd;\n"
00442 "       \n"
00443 "       if( dot(diff,diff) < dot(sum,sum) )\n"
00444 "               return qd;\n"
00445 "       return (-qd);\n"
00446 "}\n"
00447 "float b3Acos(float x) \n"
00448 "{ \n"
00449 "       if (x<-1)       \n"
00450 "               x=-1; \n"
00451 "       if (x>1)        \n"
00452 "               x=1;\n"
00453 "       return acos(x); \n"
00454 "}\n"
00455 "float getAngle(Quaternion orn)\n"
00456 "{\n"
00457 "       if (orn.w>=1.f)\n"
00458 "               orn.w=1.f;\n"
00459 "       float s = 2.f * b3Acos(orn.w);\n"
00460 "       return s;\n"
00461 "}\n"
00462 "void calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion( Quaternion orn0,Quaternion orn1a,float4* axis,float* angle)\n"
00463 "{\n"
00464 "       Quaternion orn1 = nearest(orn0,orn1a);\n"
00465 "       \n"
00466 "       Quaternion dorn = qtMul(orn1,qtInvert(orn0));\n"
00467 "       *angle = getAngle(dorn);\n"
00468 "       *axis = (float4)(dorn.x,dorn.y,dorn.z,0.f);\n"
00469 "       \n"
00470 "       //check for axis length\n"
00471 "       float len = dot3F4(*axis,*axis);\n"
00472 "       if (len < FLT_EPSILON*FLT_EPSILON)\n"
00473 "               *axis = (float4)(1,0,0,0);\n"
00474 "       else\n"
00475 "               *axis /= sqrt(len);\n"
00476 "}\n"
00477 "void getInfo2FixedOrientation(__global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraint,b3GpuConstraintInfo2* info,__global b3RigidBodyCL* bodies, int start_row)\n"
00478 "{\n"
00479 "       Quaternion worldOrnA = bodies[constraint->m_rbA].m_quat;\n"
00480 "       Quaternion worldOrnB = bodies[constraint->m_rbB].m_quat;\n"
00481 "       int s = info->rowskip;\n"
00482 "       int start_index = start_row * s;\n"
00483 "       // 3 rows to make body rotations equal\n"
00484 "       info->m_J1angularAxis[start_index] = 1;\n"
00485 "       info->m_J1angularAxis[start_index + s + 1] = 1;\n"
00486 "       info->m_J1angularAxis[start_index + s*2+2] = 1;\n"
00487 "       if ( info->m_J2angularAxis)\n"
00488 "       {\n"
00489 "               info->m_J2angularAxis[start_index] = -1;\n"
00490 "               info->m_J2angularAxis[start_index + s+1] = -1;\n"
00491 "               info->m_J2angularAxis[start_index + s*2+2] = -1;\n"
00492 "       }\n"
00493 "       \n"
00494 "       float currERP = info->erp;\n"
00495 "       float k = info->fps * currERP;\n"
00496 "       float4 diff;\n"
00497 "       float angle;\n"
00498 "       float4 qrelCur = qtMul(worldOrnA,qtInvert(worldOrnB));\n"
00499 "       \n"
00500 "       calculateDiffAxisAngleQuaternion(constraint->m_relTargetAB,qrelCur,&diff,&angle);\n"
00501 "       diff*=-angle;\n"
00502 "               \n"
00503 "       float* resultPtr = &diff;\n"
00504 "       \n"
00505 "       for (int j=0; j<3; j++)\n"
00506 "    {\n"
00507 "        info->m_constraintError[(3+j)*info->rowskip] = k * resultPtr[j];\n"
00508 "    }\n"
00509 "       \n"
00510 "}\n"
00511 "__kernel void writeBackVelocitiesKernel(__global b3RigidBodyCL* bodies,__global b3GpuSolverBody* solverBodies,int numBodies)\n"
00512 "{\n"
00513 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
00514 "       if (i>=numBodies)\n"
00515 "               return;\n"
00516 "       if (bodies[i].m_invMass)\n"
00517 "       {\n"
00518 "//             if (length(solverBodies[i].m_deltaLinearVelocity)<MOTIONCLAMP)\n"
00519 "               {\n"
00520 "                       bodies[i].m_linVel += solverBodies[i].m_deltaLinearVelocity;\n"
00521 "               }\n"
00522 "//             if (length(solverBodies[i].m_deltaAngularVelocity)<MOTIONCLAMP)\n"
00523 "               {\n"
00524 "                       bodies[i].m_angVel += solverBodies[i].m_deltaAngularVelocity;\n"
00525 "               } \n"
00526 "       }\n"
00527 "}\n"
00528 "__kernel void getInfo2Kernel(__global b3SolverConstraint* solverConstraintRows, \n"
00529 "                                                       __global unsigned int* infos, \n"
00530 "                                                       __global unsigned int* constraintRowOffsets, \n"
00531 "                                                       __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraints, \n"
00532 "                                                       __global b3BatchConstraint* batchConstraints, \n"
00533 "                                                       __global b3RigidBodyCL* bodies,\n"
00534 "                                                       __global BodyInertia* inertias,\n"
00535 "                                                       __global b3GpuSolverBody* solverBodies,\n"
00536 "                                                       float timeStep,\n"
00537 "                                                       float globalErp,\n"
00538 "                                                       float globalCfm,\n"
00539 "                                                       float globalDamping,\n"
00540 "                                                       int globalNumIterations,\n"
00541 "                                                       int numConstraints)\n"
00542 "{\n"
00543 "       int i = get_global_id(0);\n"
00544 "       if (i>=numConstraints)\n"
00545 "               return;\n"
00546 "               \n"
00547 "       //for now, always initialize the batch info\n"
00548 "       int info1 = infos[i];\n"
00549 "                       \n"
00550 "       __global b3SolverConstraint* currentConstraintRow = &solverConstraintRows[constraintRowOffsets[i]];\n"
00551 "       __global b3GpuGenericConstraint* constraint = &constraints[i];\n"
00552 "       __global b3RigidBodyCL* rbA = &bodies[ constraint->m_rbA];\n"
00553 "       __global b3RigidBodyCL* rbB = &bodies[ constraint->m_rbB];\n"
00554 "       int solverBodyIdA = constraint->m_rbA;\n"
00555 "       int solverBodyIdB = constraint->m_rbB;\n"
00556 "       __global b3GpuSolverBody* bodyAPtr = &solverBodies[solverBodyIdA];\n"
00557 "       __global b3GpuSolverBody* bodyBPtr = &solverBodies[solverBodyIdB];\n"
00558 "       if (rbA->m_invMass)\n"
00559 "       {\n"
00560 "               batchConstraints[i].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = solverBodyIdA;\n"
00561 "       } else\n"
00562 "       {\n"
00563 "//                     if (!solverBodyIdA)\n"
00564 "//                             m_staticIdx = 0;\n"
00565 "               batchConstraints[i].m_bodyAPtrAndSignBit = -solverBodyIdA;\n"
00566 "       }\n"
00567 "       if (rbB->m_invMass)\n"
00568 "       {\n"
00569 "               batchConstraints[i].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = solverBodyIdB;\n"
00570 "       } else\n"
00571 "       {\n"
00572 "//                     if (!solverBodyIdB)\n"
00573 "//                             m_staticIdx = 0;\n"
00574 "               batchConstraints[i].m_bodyBPtrAndSignBit = -solverBodyIdB;\n"
00575 "       }\n"
00576 "       if (info1)\n"
00577 "       {\n"
00578 "               int overrideNumSolverIterations = 0;//constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() > 0 ? constraint->getOverrideNumSolverIterations() : infoGlobal.m_numIterations;\n"
00579 "//             if (overrideNumSolverIterations>m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations)\n"
00580 "       //              m_maxOverrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;\n"
00581 "               int j;\n"
00582 "               for ( j=0;j<info1;j++)\n"
00583 "               {\n"
00584 "//                     memset(&currentConstraintRow[j],0,sizeof(b3SolverConstraint));\n"
00585 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_angularComponentA = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00586 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_angularComponentB = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00587 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;\n"
00588 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;\n"
00589 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_cfm = 0.f;\n"
00590 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_contactNormal = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00591 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_friction = 0.f;\n"
00592 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_frictionIndex = 0;\n"
00593 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_jacDiagABInv = 0.f;\n"
00594 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_lowerLimit = 0.f;\n"
00595 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_upperLimit = 0.f;\n"
00596 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_originalConstraint = i;\n"
00597 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_overrideNumSolverIterations = 0;\n"
00598 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_relpos1CrossNormal = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00599 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_relpos2CrossNormal = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00600 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_rhs = 0.f;\n"
00601 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_rhsPenetration = 0.f;\n"
00602 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdA = 0;\n"
00603 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdB = 0;\n"
00604 "                                                       \n"
00605 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_lowerLimit = -B3_INFINITY;\n"
00606 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_upperLimit = B3_INFINITY;\n"
00607 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;\n"
00608 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_appliedPushImpulse = 0.f;\n"
00609 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdA = solverBodyIdA;\n"
00610 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_solverBodyIdB = solverBodyIdB;\n"
00611 "                       currentConstraintRow[j].m_overrideNumSolverIterations = overrideNumSolverIterations;            \n"
00612 "               }\n"
00613 "               bodyAPtr->m_deltaLinearVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00614 "               bodyAPtr->m_deltaAngularVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00615 "               bodyAPtr->m_pushVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00616 "               bodyAPtr->m_turnVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00617 "               bodyBPtr->m_deltaLinearVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00618 "               bodyBPtr->m_deltaAngularVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00619 "               bodyBPtr->m_pushVelocity = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00620 "               bodyBPtr->m_turnVelocity  = (float4)(0,0,0,0);\n"
00621 "               int rowskip = sizeof(b3SolverConstraint)/sizeof(float);//check this\n"
00622 "               \n"
00623 "               b3GpuConstraintInfo2 info2;\n"
00624 "               info2.fps = 1.f/timeStep;\n"
00625 "               info2.erp = globalErp;\n"
00626 "               info2.m_J1linearAxisFloat4 = &currentConstraintRow->m_contactNormal;\n"
00627 "               info2.m_J1angularAxisFloat4 = &currentConstraintRow->m_relpos1CrossNormal;\n"
00628 "               info2.m_J2linearAxisFloat4 = 0;\n"
00629 "               info2.m_J2angularAxisFloat4 = &currentConstraintRow->m_relpos2CrossNormal;\n"
00630 "               info2.rowskip = sizeof(b3SolverConstraint)/sizeof(float);//check this\n"
00631 "               ///the size of b3SolverConstraint needs be a multiple of float\n"
00632 "//             b3Assert(info2.rowskip*sizeof(float)== sizeof(b3SolverConstraint));\n"
00633 "               info2.m_constraintError = &currentConstraintRow->m_rhs;\n"
00634 "               currentConstraintRow->m_cfm = globalCfm;\n"
00635 "               info2.m_damping = globalDamping;\n"
00636 "               info2.cfm = &currentConstraintRow->m_cfm;\n"
00637 "               info2.m_lowerLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_lowerLimit;\n"
00638 "               info2.m_upperLimit = &currentConstraintRow->m_upperLimit;\n"
00639 "               info2.m_numIterations = globalNumIterations;\n"
00640 "               switch (constraint->m_constraintType)\n"
00641 "               {\n"
00642 "                       case B3_GPU_POINT2POINT_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:\n"
00643 "                       {\n"
00644 "                               getInfo2Point2Point(constraint,&info2,bodies);\n"
00645 "                               break;\n"
00646 "                       }\n"
00647 "                       case B3_GPU_FIXED_CONSTRAINT_TYPE:\n"
00648 "                       {\n"
00649 "                               getInfo2Point2Point(constraint,&info2,bodies);\n"
00650 "                               getInfo2FixedOrientation(constraint,&info2,bodies,3);\n"
00651 "                               break;\n"
00652 "                       }\n"
00653 "                       default:\n"
00654 "                       {\n"
00655 "                       }\n"
00656 "               }\n"
00657 "               ///finalize the constraint setup\n"
00658 "               for ( j=0;j<info1;j++)\n"
00659 "               {\n"
00660 "                       __global b3SolverConstraint* solverConstraint = &currentConstraintRow[j];\n"
00661 "                       if (solverConstraint->m_upperLimit>=constraint->m_breakingImpulseThreshold)\n"
00662 "                       {\n"
00663 "                               solverConstraint->m_upperLimit = constraint->m_breakingImpulseThreshold;\n"
00664 "                       }\n"
00665 "                       if (solverConstraint->m_lowerLimit<=-constraint->m_breakingImpulseThreshold)\n"
00666 "                       {\n"
00667 "                               solverConstraint->m_lowerLimit = -constraint->m_breakingImpulseThreshold;\n"
00668 "                       }\n"
00669 "//                                             solverConstraint->m_originalContactPoint = constraint;\n"
00670 "                                                       \n"
00671 "                       Matrix3x3 invInertiaWorldA= inertias[constraint->m_rbA].m_invInertiaWorld;\n"
00672 "                       {\n"
00673 "                               //float4 angularFactorA(1,1,1);\n"
00674 "                               float4 ftorqueAxis1 = solverConstraint->m_relpos1CrossNormal;\n"
00675 "                               solverConstraint->m_angularComponentA = mtMul1(invInertiaWorldA,ftorqueAxis1);//*angularFactorA;\n"
00676 "                       }\n"
00677 "                                               \n"
00678 "                       Matrix3x3 invInertiaWorldB= inertias[constraint->m_rbB].m_invInertiaWorld;\n"
00679 "                       {\n"
00680 "                               float4 ftorqueAxis2 = solverConstraint->m_relpos2CrossNormal;\n"
00681 "                               solverConstraint->m_angularComponentB = mtMul1(invInertiaWorldB,ftorqueAxis2);//*constraint->m_rbB.getAngularFactor();\n"
00682 "                       }\n"
00683 "                       {\n"
00684 "                               //it is ok to use solverConstraint->m_contactNormal instead of -solverConstraint->m_contactNormal\n"
00685 "                               //because it gets multiplied iMJlB\n"
00686 "                               float4 iMJlA = solverConstraint->m_contactNormal*rbA->m_invMass;\n"
00687 "                               float4 iMJaA = mtMul3(solverConstraint->m_relpos1CrossNormal,invInertiaWorldA);\n"
00688 "                               float4 iMJlB = solverConstraint->m_contactNormal*rbB->m_invMass;//sign of normal?\n"
00689 "                               float4 iMJaB = mtMul3(solverConstraint->m_relpos2CrossNormal,invInertiaWorldB);\n"
00690 "                               float sum = dot3F4(iMJlA,solverConstraint->m_contactNormal);\n"
00691 "                               sum += dot3F4(iMJaA,solverConstraint->m_relpos1CrossNormal);\n"
00692 "                               sum += dot3F4(iMJlB,solverConstraint->m_contactNormal);\n"
00693 "                               sum += dot3F4(iMJaB,solverConstraint->m_relpos2CrossNormal);\n"
00694 "                               float fsum = fabs(sum);\n"
00695 "                               if (fsum>FLT_EPSILON)\n"
00696 "                               {\n"
00697 "                                       solverConstraint->m_jacDiagABInv = 1.f/sum;\n"
00698 "                               } else\n"
00699 "                               {\n"
00700 "                                       solverConstraint->m_jacDiagABInv = 0.f;\n"
00701 "                               }\n"
00702 "                       }\n"
00703 "                       ///fix rhs\n"
00704 "                       ///todo: add force/torque accelerators\n"
00705 "                       {\n"
00706 "                               float rel_vel;\n"
00707 "                               float vel1Dotn = dot3F4(solverConstraint->m_contactNormal,rbA->m_linVel) + dot3F4(solverConstraint->m_relpos1CrossNormal,rbA->m_angVel);\n"
00708 "                               float vel2Dotn = -dot3F4(solverConstraint->m_contactNormal,rbB->m_linVel) + dot3F4(solverConstraint->m_relpos2CrossNormal,rbB->m_angVel);\n"
00709 "                               rel_vel = vel1Dotn+vel2Dotn;\n"
00710 "                               float restitution = 0.f;\n"
00711 "                               float positionalError = solverConstraint->m_rhs;//already filled in by getConstraintInfo2\n"
00712 "                               float   velocityError = restitution - rel_vel * info2.m_damping;\n"
00713 "                               float   penetrationImpulse = positionalError*solverConstraint->m_jacDiagABInv;\n"
00714 "                               float   velocityImpulse = velocityError *solverConstraint->m_jacDiagABInv;\n"
00715 "                               solverConstraint->m_rhs = penetrationImpulse+velocityImpulse;\n"
00716 "                               solverConstraint->m_appliedImpulse = 0.f;\n"
00717 "                       }\n"
00718 "               }\n"
00719 "       }\n"
00720 "}\n"
00721 ;
